page.title: 15The School Sports.
page.content: Hillhead School held the senior sports in which the 4 house teams Whaligoe, Girnigoe, Sandigoe and Shelligoe competed. Primary 4, 5, 6 and 7 all had the same races which were the flat race, sack race, skipping race, shuttle relay, tug of war and the slow cycle race. The primary 6 and 7 got throwing a cricketball, highjump and the longjump.If there were too many people in a race they split it up into heats and then a final. There were some parents watching their children run. There was a tuck shop selling crisps, sweets and drinks in between races. Finally there was a long track circuit race for primary 6 and 7 with two from each house taking part. Whaligoe and Girnigoe were joint winners of the sports shield.
